dmca.title: notice of infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Purplemath [mailto:stapel@purplemath.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, July 04, 2006 1:27 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: notice of infringement
Subject: notice of infringement


Dear NationMaster Webmaster,

It has come to our attention that the following page:

http://www.nationmaster.com/encyclopedia/Imaginary-number

...contains copyrighted content originally created for the Purplemath
web site. The original content may be viewed here:

http://www.purplemath.com/modules/complex.htm

Contrary to the implication of the header on the relevant section of the
NationaMaster page, this Purplemath content is not public domain ("open"
or "free" for the taking), and copyright may not be claimed by
NationMaster, nor is a license to reproduce or re-license granted to
NationMaster.

The usage terms of Purplemath may be viewed here:

http://www.purplemath.com/terms.htm

Please take appropriate action regarding this issue.

Thank you.

Sincerely,

Elizabeth Stapel
Purplemath - Your Algebra Resource
http://www.purplemath.com/
